name: Don't Shoot The Circles
description:
This is a game I made for Trijam 214.  The concept of the game is simple: do not shoot the circles.  This is the first game I made in nearly three years and only the second one I've actually completed with Unity.  Hope you enjoy it. 

The music used was from the following Humble Bundle: https://www.humblebundle.com/software/sfx-and-music-for-your-games-software

If there was more time, a few items I would have liked to have added or improve upon:

  • Add scoring
  • Add Title Screen
  • Improve Ally and Enemy spawning.  Would have been nice to have the enemies to slowly spawn at a faster and faster rate
  • Improve the collision detection on game over
  • Add actual sprites and background for characters

Source code for the game is available at: https://github.com/jmast1161/DontShoot
